ygData.subject: RE: Lambent Breastplate (spoiler)
ygData.msgSnippet: I don t know where they got this idea of a named gypsy musician.  it s the opposite.  Mynthi Davissi is the named gypsy musician, she drops the Lute of the
ygData.messageBody:
I don't know where they got this idea of a named gypsy musician. it's the
opposite. Mynthi Davissi is the named gypsy musician, she drops the Lute of
the Gypsy Princess. it is the regular non-named gypsy musicians in the
piano room that will drop the correct Gypsy Lute. i was not reimbursed for
anything, because in fact i was wrong. i feel dumb now too, of course in
hindsight. every other item needed for lambent armor is a lore item/no drop
off a non-named common mob, whereas the LotGP is off a rare named mob, and
is neither lore nor no drop. oh well, i went back to mistmoore and got the
correct lute, another carapace and lambent stone, and got the breastplate.
i also have the gauntlets, one bracer, arms, and boots. i have 1 of 2 items
for the legs and another bracer. i know someone who has gotten legs and a
helm, therefore every quest is working properly. i won't go after the helm
since i won't wear a helm =)

Shada Bladestorm, Level 50 Wood Elf Bard
Erisi Dlarit, Level 24 High Elf Paladin
Tyria Sarkin, Level 22 High Elf Wizard
Manda, Level 15 Wood Elf Warrior
Mithaniel Marr Server

p.s. what nicknames are floating around other servers? Blueberry seems to
be the prevailing one on mine for any bards with lambent armor =)

>
> From: Benjamin Jerrad Segal <birdman@...>
>
> Posted a half hour ago to the Concert Hall message board:
>
> Lambent BP
> by Samlor
>
> The Lambent BP takes a gypsy lute off a named gypsy musician,
> not the lute
> of the gypsy princess. I'd like to give props to Devspawn, Xandelwyn,
> Ming, Norl and Parthos for helping me get this mofo.
>

Athren Notechaser, instilling fear into mobs everywhere
